task_completion.description: Completeness of the given task, including all subtasks in the right order

action_validity.description: The validity of the actions chosen given the available options

thought_accuracy.description: Accuracy of the thoughts in guiding and planning the agent's actions towards accomplishing the task

efficiency.description: The efficiency of the actions taken to complete the task, minimizing the number of turns

compliance_with_instructions.description: Adherence to specific rules and instructions such as reply formatting and termination conditions
